movie.title: Wake Island
movie.plot: In November 1941, Major Caton takes command of the small Marine garrison on Wake Island. His tendency toward spit and polish upsets the men's tropical lassitude, but Pearl Harbor changes everything. Soon the island is attacked and the Marines pull together day by day; but how long can they hold out?
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.

movie.title: The Killing of John Lennon
movie.plot: A dramatization of Mark Chapman's plan to murder John Lennon.

events.title: Mark David Chapman kills John Lennon

movie.title: Chapter 27
movie.plot: A film about Mark David Chapman in the days leading up to the infamous murder of Beatle John Lennon.

events.title: Hanoi Rocks drummer Razzle is killed in a car crash

movie.title: The Dirt
movie.plot: Based on the bestselling autobiography from Mötley Crüe, the film is an unflinching tale of success and excess as four misfits rise from the streets of Hollywood to the heights of international fame.
